strings.PROPER_SAVE_QUIT_DIALOG_SAVED: [ProperSave] The game was saved at the start of the current stage
strings.PROPER_SAVE_QUIT_DIALOG_SAVED_BEFORE: [ProperSave] The game was saved {0} stage(s) ago
strings.PROPER_SAVE_QUIT_DIALOG_NOT_SAVED: [ProperSave] The game was not saved yet
strings.PROPER_SAVE_TOOLTIP_LOAD_CONTENT_MISMATC: <color=#ff0000>The game content is different from content during save. This can result in loading errors.</color>
